bibl.title: Cities of Alexander the Great
bibl.note: Collects and analyses the traditions relating to the foundations of cities by Alexander the Great. - Pp. 205-226: The Alexander-Romance [the foundation and description of Alexandria in Egypt]; - 262: Index of Greek Papyri.
FRASER Peter M., Cities of Alexander the Great
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1996, 8°, xi-263 pp. 1 tabl., 2 cartes. ISBN 0-19-815006-7. £40.
